timeline.bodyText:
please avoid creating nested classes in Bricks,

move PickableMusicalInstrument to org.catrobat.catroid.content.bricks.brickspinner; and make it class instead of enum, which implements Nameable & Serializable
let this brick implement BrickSpinner.OnItemSelectedListener<PickableMusicalInstrument>
timeline.author: ndrnour
ndrnour
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,220 @@
+/*
+ * Catroid: An on-device visual programming system for Android devices
+ * Copyright (C) 2010-2020 The Catrobat Team

+
+package org.catrobat.catroid.content.bricks;
+
+import android.content.Context;
+import android.view.View;
+
+import org.catrobat.catroid.R;
+import org.catrobat.catroid.common.Nameable;
+import org.catrobat.catroid.content.Sprite;
+import org.catrobat.catroid.content.actions.ScriptSequenceAction;
+import org.catrobat.catroid.content.bricks.brickspinner.BrickSpinner;
+import org.catrobat.catroid.pocketmusic.note.MusicalInstrument;
+
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+
+import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
+
+public class SetInstrumentBrick extends BrickBaseType {
+
+	public enum PickableMusicalInstrument implements Nameable {
+		ACOUSTIC_GRAND_PIANO("Acoustic Grand Piano", 1),
+		BRIGHT_ACOUSTIC_PIANO("Bright Acoustic Piano", 2),
+		ELECTRIC_GRAND_PIANO("Electric Grand Piano", 3),
+		HONKY_TONK_PIANO("Honky-tonk Piano", 4),
+		ELECTRIC_PIANO_1("Rhodes Piano", 5),
+		ELECTRIC_PIANO_2("Chorused Piano", 6),
+		HARPSICHORD("Harpsichord", 7),
+		CLAVI("Clavinet", 8),
+		CELESTA("Celesta", 9),
+		DRAWBAR_ORGAN("Drawbar Organ", 17),
+		PERCUSSIVE_ORGAN("Percussive Organ", 18),
+		ROCK_ORGAN("Rock Organ", 19),
+		CHURCH_ORGAN("Church Organ", 20),
+		REED_ORGAN("Reed Organ", 21),
+		ACOUSTIC_GUITAR_NYLON("Acoustic Guitar", 25),
+		ACOUSTIC_GUITAR_STEEL("Acoustic Guitar Steel", 26),
+		ELECTRIC_GUITAR_JAZZ("Electric Guitar", 27),
+		ELECTRIC_GUITAR_CLEAN("Electric Guitar Clean", 28),
+		ELECTRIC_GUITAR_MUTED("Electric Guitar Muted", 29),
+		OVERDRIVEN_GUITAR("Overdriven Guitar", 30),
+		DISTORTION_GUITAR("Distortion Guitar", 31),
+		GUITAR_HARMONICS("Guitar Harmonics", 32),
+		ACOUSTIC_BASS("Acoustic Bass", 33),
+		ELECTRIC_BASS_FINGER("Electric Bass Finger", 34),
+		ELECTRIC_BASS_PICK("Electric Bass Pick", 35),
+		FRETLESS_BASS("Fretless Bass", 36),
+		SLAP_BASS_1("Slap Bass 1", 37),
+		SLAP_BASS_2("Slap Bass 2", 38),
+		SYNTH_BASS_1("Synth Bass 1", 39),
+		SYNTH_BASS_2("Synth Bass 2", 40),
+		CONTRABASS("Contrabass", 44),
+		TREMOLO_STRINGS("Tremolo Strings", 45),
+		PIZZICATO_STRINGS("Pizzicato", 46),
+		ORCHESTRAL_HARP("Orchestral Harp", 47),
+		TIMPANI("Timpani", 48),
+		STRING_ENSEMBLE_1("Strings", 49),
+		STRING_ENSEMBLE_2("Slow Strings", 50),
+		SYNTH_STRINGS_1("Synth Strings 1", 51),
+		SYNTH_STRINGS_2("Synth Strings 2", 52),
+		VOICE_AAHS("Choir Aahs", 53),
+		VOICE_OOHS("Voice Oohs", 54),
+		SYNTH_VOICE("Synth Voice", 55),
+		ORCHESTRA_HIT("Orchestra Hit", 56),
+		TRUMPET("Trumpet", 57),
+		TROMBONE("Trombone", 58),
+		TUBA("Tuba", 59),
+		FRENCH_HORN("French Horn", 61),
+		BRASS_SECTION("Brass Section", 62),
+		SYNTH_BRASS_1("Synth Brass 1", 63),
+		SYNTH_BRASS_2("Synth Brass 2", 64),
+		SOPRANO_SAX("Soprano Sax", 65),
+		ALTO_SAX("Alto Sax", 66),
+		TENOR_SAX("Tenor Sax", 67),
+		BARITONE_SAX("Baritone Sax", 68),
+		OBOE("Oboe", 69),
+		ENGLISH_HORN("English Horn", 70),
+		BASSOON("Bassoon", 71),
+		CLARINET("Clarinet", 72),
+		LEAD_1_SQUARE("Lead Square Wave", 81),
+		LEAD_2_SAWTOOTH("Lead Sawtooth Wave", 82),
+		LEAD_3_CALLIOPE("Lead Calliope", 83),
+		LEAD_4_CHIFF("Lead Chiffer", 84),
+		LEAD_5_CHARANG("Lead Charang", 85),
+		LEAD_6_VOICE("Lead Voice Solo", 86),
+		LEAD_7_FIFTHS("Lead Fifths", 87),
+		LEAD_8_BASS_AND_LEAD("Lead Bass and Lead", 88),
+		PAD_1_NEW_AGE("Pad New Age Fantasia", 89),
+		PAD_2_WARM("Pad Warm", 90),
+		PAD_3_POLYSYNTH("Pad Polysinth", 91),
+		PAD_4_CHOIR("Pad Choir Space Voice", 92),
+		PAD_5_BOWED("Pad Bowed Glass", 93),
+		PAD_6_METALLIC("Pad Metallic Pro", 94),
+		PAD_7_HALO("Pad Halo", 95),
+		PAD_8_SWEEP("Pad Sweep", 96),
+		FX_1_RAIN("FX Rain", 97),
+		FX_2_SOUNDTRACK("FX Soundtrack", 98),
+		FX_3_CRYSTAL("FX Crystal", 99),
+		FX_4_ATMOSPHERE("FX Atmosphere", 100),
+		FX_5_BRIGHTNESS("FX Brightness", 101),
+		FX_6_GOBLINS("FX Goblins", 102),
+		FX_7_ECHOES("FX 7 Echoes, Drops", 103),
+		FX_8_SCI_FI("FX Sci-fi", 104),
+		SITAR("Sitar", 105),
+		BANJO("Banjo", 106),
+		SHAMISEN("Shamisen", 107),
+		KOTO("Koto", 108),
+		KALIMBA("Kalimba", 109),
+		BAGPIPE("Bagpipe", 110),
+		SHANAI("Shanai", 112),
+		TINKLE_BELL("Tinkle bell", 113);
+
+		private String name;
+		private int value;
+		PickableMusicalInstrument(String name, int value) {
+			this.name = name;
+			this.value = value;
+		}
+
+		public static int getIndexByValue(int value) {
+			int index = 0;
+			for (PickableMusicalInstrument instrument : PickableMusicalInstrument.values()) {
+				if (instrument.getValue() == value) {
+					return index;
+				}
+				index++;
+			}
+			return -1;
+		}
+
+		@Override
+		public String getName() {
+			return name;
+		}
+
+		public int getValue() {
+			return value;
+		}
+
+		@Override
+		public void setName(String name) {
+			this.name = name;
+		}
+
+		public void setValue(int value) {
+			this.value = value;
+		}
+	}
+
+	public int instrumentSelection = PickableMusicalInstrument.values()[0].getValue();

timeline.bodyText: add a new function in org.catrobat.catroid.utils.java which returns a list of the constants defined from line 44 to line 133.
timeline.author: ndrnour

+	@Override

+		return R.layout.brick_set_instrument;
+	}
+
+	protected int getSpinnerId() {
+		return R.id.set_instrument_spinner;
+	}
+
+	@Override
+	public View getView(Context context) {
+		super.getView(context);
+		List<Nameable> items = new ArrayList<>();
+
+		for (PickableMusicalInstrument instrument : PickableMusicalInstrument.values()) {
+			items.add(instrument);
+		}

replies.bodyText: Because PickableMusicalInstrument is now a class I just create objects of it with the right strings and values, put them all in a list and return it, right?
replies.author: Rawbat

timeline.bodyText:
since MusicalInstrument.getInstrumentFromProgram() is public static, please call it from the action.
once requested changes are implemented, no need to -1 anymore
timeline.author: ndrnour
ndrnour

timeline.bodyText:
you missed to add serialVersionUID attribute for this class, please just add this line
private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
timeline.author: ndrnour

+package org.catrobat.catroid.content.bricks.brickspinner;
+
+import org.catrobat.catroid.common.Nameable;
+import org.catrobat.catroid.utils.Utils;
+
+import java.io.Serializable;
+
+public class PickableMusicalInstrument implements Nameable, Serializable {
+
